original: Lindström, Helge Einar Birger, komminister, Kalmar, f. 2/7/S9 i Glem-minge, Krist. 1., av biskop Herman L. o. Beata Brorström. G. 17 m. Rut Nordström. Barn: Göran f. 18, d. 40, Bengt 21. — Mog:ex. i Växjö 07, fil. kand. i Lund 10, teol. kand., prakt, teol. prov ’Samt prästv. f. Växjö stift 16. Tjg. som v. pastor i Skärstad, kyr-koadj. i Kalmar 18-20, ständig adj. där 20-28, kommin. där sed. 28, därjämte pred. v. Kalmar försörjn:in-rättn. 18-40. Skr.: Kristi närvaro (25), Lammet med korsfanan (30).
translated:
Lindström, Helge Einar Birger, parish vicar, Kalmar, born on July 2nd, 1899 in Glemminge, Kristianstad, son of bishop Herman L. and Beata Brorström. Married on July 17th, with Rut Nordström. Children: Göran, born in 1918 and died in 1940, Bengt born in 1921.

Completed exams: Växjö 1907, Bachelor of Arts in Lund 1910, Bachelor of Theology, practical theological examination. Ordained as a priest for the Växjö diocese in 1916. Served as assistant minister in Skärstad, curate in Kalmar from 1918 to 1920, permanent adjutant there from 1920 to 1928, parish vicar since 1928. Additionally, served as a preacher at the Kalmar social welfare institution from 1918 to 1940. Published works: Kristi närvaro (1925), Lammet med korsfanan (1930).

additionalProperty.name: Preacher at Kalmar social welfare institution
